body_html:
Hi @aaroey, the PR is ready to go now after you review the latest changes.

I have a test script to train or evaluate a simple model on MNIST using this feature. Would it make sense to include it in the test suite here? How do you handle tests which use external data (the model checkpoint in this case).

body:
Hi @aaroey, the PR is ready to go now after you review the latest changes.

I have a test script to train or evaluate a simple model on MNIST using this feature. Would it make sense to include it in the test suite here? How do you handle tests which use external data (the model checkpoint in this case).
